channel.title: Soil Sampling on QField - Efficient field work built for QGIS
channel.description: Recent content in Soil Sampling on QField - Efficient field work built for QGIS

item.title: QField for Agriculture and Precision Farming
item.description:
Field data for precision agriculture

Collect observations, pests, nutrient deficiencies, and treatment records. Use standardized forms to maintain quality.

Typical workflows

  • Crop scouting and disease monitoring
  • Soil sampling and fertility mapping
  • Treatment records and compliance

Integrated with QGIS and QFieldCloud

Build data models in QGIS and collaborate with QFieldCloud for timely decisions.

item.title: QField for Soil and Land Quality Surveys
item.description:
What you can do

  • Plan sampling grids and record field logs
  • Capture depths, horizons, and conditions
  • Attach photos and sync to QFieldCloud
